title: Land For Sale-mawaramandiya (meegawatta)
details:
This Land Is Located In "serenge Range Housing Scheme" Beautiful Coconut Estate Of 6 Achere, All 20ft Roads,water,electricity Provided.
Distance From Kiribathgoda Is 9km. And Total Distance To Colombo Is 18km. It Take About 30 Minutes To Colombo 

LAST FEW BLOCKS ARE AVAILABLE
